description: This file defines API routes for managing notes in a notes application, using FastAPI framework. It includes routes for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, utilizing dependency injection for storage access, and returning appropriate response models and status codes.

methods.name: list_notes( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional case-insensitive substring to search in title or content"), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip for pagination"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Maximum number of items to return"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notes with optional search and pagination.

methods.name: create_note( payload: NoteCreate, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note with server-generated ID and timestamps.

methods.name: get_note( note_id: UUID, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by its UUID.

methods.name: update_note( note_id: UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note identified by UUID.

methods.name: delete_note( note_id: UUID, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by UUID.

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.signature: ( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional case-insensitive substring to search in title or content"), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip for pagination"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Maximum number of items to return"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
